narrative:
Licensee voluntarily surrendered his USDA license at time of this inspection. He is no longer engaged in covered activities 
licensed by the USDA. He is aware that he can not engage in covered activities without a USDA license.  
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.  
 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
